title: Ep223 Hoosier Daddy
description:
This week, the gals take a drive to another Midwest state to chat about some indiscretions in Indiana. Topics include a very devious mother-son relationship, some murderous mean girls, and way too many possible origins of the state's nickname. Open a bottle of Sip and Share Winery's Intention Riesling, take away your brother's crossbow, and tune in for Hoosier Daddy.

For a full list of show sponsors, visit www.wineandcrimepodcast.com/support
